3.3.17  11:28 pm   Don't let those people stop you from posting things on Instagram! It really doesn't spoil the video. It's gonna be long and wild and crazy and there's no way that 30+ pictures can encapsulate the thrill of watching the completed video. I mean, I've seen History of Japan countless times and there are still little details that I missed before. So, do whatever you wanted to do. Do you agree?

or is was it just a joke? i hope you take as much time thats needed to make the video so it turns out better.
